0.0.1.name: wordpress/allegrato
0.0.1.description:
plugin home page: http://blog.smentek.eu/allegrato-wordpress-plugin-for-auction-and-publication-systems/

Plugin needs PHP 5.3.x or higher.

Current version supports only one widget My allegro auctions that displays user auctions from allegro system. Allegrato supports all foreign allegros 'like' foreign systems that works with allegro webapi:

*allegro.by *aukro.bg *aukro.cz *teszvesz.hu *allegro.kz *tizo.ro *molotok.ru *aukro.sk *aukro.ua *allegro.rs *aukro.ua
